channel.title: Something wrong with shops?
channel.description:
Well I dont know what is wrong. When I add a new shop, you click trade, but nothing pops up. I used a tut in the Tutorials section. Ill post what coding I have: [code] } else if (NPCID == 230) { //TuT shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 44; //TuT Shop[/code]
[code]shop = 43 Grandpa Chuck's TuT Shop 2 2 1001 1 1002 1 1003 1[/code]
[code]spawn = 230 3212 3422 0 3213 3423 3211 3421 2 Gradpa Chuck/TuT Shop[/code]
Nothing pops up. (Yes I know this is a noob example of a shop. Lol. But the rare shop and the Food shop I added dont work either. This was the smallest example.)

item.title: Something wrong with shops?
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

The code is good. This happened to me before. You have to add it in on the top of one of the working shopkeepers that use trade.

Read full topic

item.title: Something wrong with shops?
item.dc:creator: @ebaums_world ebaums world
item.description:
@ebaums_world wrote:

Well I dont know what is wrong. When I add a new shop, you click trade, but nothing pops up. I used a tut in the Tutorials section. Ill post what coding I have:

} else if (NPCID == 230) { //TuT shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 44; //TuT Shop

shop = 43	Grandpa Chuck's TuT Shop			2	2	1001	1	1002	1	1003	1
spawn = 230	3212	3422	0	3213	3423	3211	3421	2	Gradpa Chuck/TuT Shop

Nothing pops up. (Yes I know this is a noob example of a shop. Lol. But the rare shop and the Food shop I added dont work either. This was the smallest example.)

Read full topic
